job_tasks.phrase: AI workloads and DL models specifically tailored for large-scale deep learning LLM training
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to working with and understanding deep learning models, which is a core aspect of model development and analysis.

job_tasks.phrase: Benchmarking, Profiling, and Analyzing the performance to find bottlenecks and identify areas of improvement and optimizations
job_tasks.justification: Benchmarking, profiling, and analyzing performance are all key activities in understanding and optimizing the behavior of AI models.
This involves creating or modifying software tools for performance analysis, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with many teams from HW to SW to provide performance analysis insights
job_tasks.justification: This implies integrating performance analysis into the broader software and hardware development lifecycle, requiring collaboration across teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Define performance test planning , set performance expectations for new technologies and solutions, and work to reach the performance targets limits
job_tasks.justification: This involves defining how models and systems will be tested and what performance metrics they should achieve, directly related to model evaluation and optimization.

job_tasks.phrase: In-depth knowledge and experience with AI workloads and benchmarking for distributed LLM training.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights deep understanding and practical application of AI workloads and their performance characteristics.

job_tasks.phrase: Knowledge in CUDA, and NCCL libraries.
job_tasks.justification: CUDA and NCCL are libraries fundamental to deep learning model training and optimization, especially on NVIDIA hardware.
Congestion control is critical for efficient data transfer in distributed systems, directly impacting the performance of large-scale AI model training.

soft_skills.phrase: Team player with good communication and interpersonal skills
dive deeply into the details, understand performance expectation, limitations, and bottlenecks
identify areas of improvement and optimizations

classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on profiling, analyzing, and optimizing performance of large-scale deep learning LLM training, emphasizing deep analysis of models and infrastructure. While GenAI technologies are mentioned (LLMs), the core task is performance research and engineering, aligning more with the predictive modeling and performance tuning aspects of an ML Engineer.
